explains: v. 假装，冒充；模拟，模仿；看上去像；计算机模拟

sentences.en: Computer software can be used to simulate conditions on the seabed.
sentences.cn: 计算机软件可用于模拟海底状况。

sentences.en: The scientist developed one model to simulate a full year of the globe's climate.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家研制出一个模型，能模拟全年地球的气候。

sentences.en: These light-emitting diodes could simulate red light.
sentences.cn: 这些发光二极管可以模拟红光。
